LanguageData.VQEA_Woundless.label: woundless
LanguageData.VQEA_Woundless.description: Carriers of this gene rapidly heal from bleeding wounds. Their flesh seals itself moments after injury, preventing blood loss entirely and allowing them to fight through trauma that would kill others.
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelSkin.label: plasteel skin
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelSkin.description: Carriers of this gene possess dense, reinforced dermal armor. Their skin resists bullets, absorbs blunt force, and disperses heat, turning their entire body into a living shield.
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelClaws.label: plasteel claw
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelClaws.description: Carriers of this gene grow synthetic alloy claws capable of slicing through armor and flesh. These natural weapons are always equipped and strike with brutal efficiency.
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelClaws.comps.0.tools.0.label: plasteel claw
LanguageData.VQEA_PassiveMeditation.label: passive meditation
LanguageData.VQEA_PassiveMeditation.description: Carriers of this gene possess archites that passively channel ambient psychic energy, replenishing psyfocus without meditation. These ever-attuned minds remain sharp, composed, and ready to cast at all times.
LanguageData.VQEA_Bulwark.label: bulwark
LanguageData.VQEA_Bulwark.description: Archites within the carrier’s tissues reinforce cellular structures, reducing incoming damage by half. Pain receptors are dampened in favor of combat awareness, and the body itself resists trauma that would cripple an ordinary human.
LanguageData.VQEA_Enormous.label: enormous
LanguageData.VQEA_Enormous.description: Carriers of this gene are saturated with growth-regulating archites that massively increase body size and muscle mass. Their immense frame allows for feats of brute strength, at the cost of speed and appetite.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulIntellectual.label: masterful intellectual
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulIntellectual.description: This person will conduct research subconsciously, constantly generating scientific progress even while performing other tasks or resting.
LanguageData.VQEA_NoPain.label: no pain sensitivity
LanguageData.VQEA_NoPain.description: This creature has a reduced pain sensitivity, and it takes longer to be downed due to pain.
LanguageData.VQEA_InjectionComa.label: injection coma
LanguageData.VQEA_InjectionComa.description: This person has undergone an archite injection. The injected archites are actively rewriting their genetic composition, altering tissues and cellular chemistry throughout the body. During this process, the body cannot safely function, so the subject is held in a deep coma.\n\nThe duration of this coma can be shortened with advanced lab equipment.
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.label: hemocollapse syndrome
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.description: A rare and terminal disorder where the bone marrow gradually fails to produce vital hemogen components. The body weakens and the organs strain, eventually leading to death.
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.stages.0.label: latent
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.stages.1.label: progressive
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.stages.2.label: advanced
LanguageData.VQEA_HemocollapseSyndrome.stages.3.label: terminal
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.label: levitation
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.description: Limited flight that allows this colonist to levitate over terrain. They will ignore terrain movement costs when moving.
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.label: invisibility
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.description: This person has used psychic suggestion to turn themselves invisible for a short duration.
LanguageData.VQEA_SelfRepairingTissue.label: self-repairing tissue
LanguageData.VQEA_SelfRepairingTissue.description: This person possesses archite-woven regenerative tissue that continuously rebuilds damaged cells and restores lost structure. They are capable of regrowing missing organs and body parts, but the process takes time.
LanguageData.VQEA_Regenerating.label: regenerating
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.label: matter phasing
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.description: This person has shifted into an intangible state, letting them pass through walls before becoming solid again.
LanguageData.VQEA_SuicideHediff.label: dying
